fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • Iquique is in northern Chile, not in the south of the country as we said (A marriage made in heaven: cabin crew get hitched by pope, 19 January, page 36). • Our world music album of the month from 47Soul is called Balfron Promise, not Balfran Promise as we had it (26 January, page 15, G2).
